casebody.data:
SERVISS vs. BOARD OF PUBLIC WORKS (Detroit), 4 D. L. N., 751.

(Certiorari to Wayne.)

To compel respondent to approve a plat which covered premises which would be within the lines of a public street, if extended, and made no provisions for such street.

The Circuit Court refused the writ.

Affirmed November 17, 1897. See No. 1655.
